meanings.definition: A compound containing one and a half times the amount of carbonate as a normal carbonate compound.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the sesquicarbonate under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The sesquicarbonate was used in the experiment to test its properties.
meanings.sent3: The sesquicarbonate walked into the lab, surprising everyone with its unique structure.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a sesquicarbonate, always adding a bit more than expected.
meanings.sent5: The vivid blue color of the sesquicarbonate made it stand out among the other compounds.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with sesquicarbonate.
meanings.sent1: The chemist will sesquicarbonate the solution to enhance its properties.
meanings.sent2: It is important to sesquicarbonate the mixture for the desired effect.
meanings.sent3: She sesquicarbonated the ingredients together, creating a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a catalyst, sesquicarbonating the team's motivation.
meanings.sent5: The artist sesquicarbonated the colors on the canvas, creating a beautiful masterpiece.
